article.description: Steve Novak's hot hand in OT pushed the Golden Eagles past the Tigers.
article.headline: Novak, Marquette's OT perfection too much for Tigers

images.name: McKinney Jimmy 030322 inline
images.caption: Marquette's Travis Diener, left, got off the deck to score 26 points.

article.linkText: Marquette works overtime to oust Mizzou
article.story: COLUMBIA, Mo. (AP)---- Arthur Johnson had 21 points and 12 rebounds and No. 5 Missouri beat Lithuania Inter Hoop 85-76 in an exhibition game Monday night. Rickey Paulding scored 15 points, including a highlight dunk on a bounce pass off the glass from Jimmy McKinney. McKinney had 12 points and seven assists and Travon Bryant added 10 points for Missouri. Erikas Kuciauskas and Mindaugas Sakalauskas led Inter Hoop with 13 points each, while Mantas Cesnauskis scored nine of his 12 points in the final 3:30 to lead a late comeback attempt.
